pos: nouns which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

lessons.japanese: 防犯のために登下校時は、名札を外してください。
lessons.english: In order to prevent crime, please take off your name tag when travelling to and from school.

lessons.japanese: 防犯のために登下校時は、名札を外してください。
lessons.english: For security reasons, please take off your name tag when commuting to and from school.

lessons.japanese: 防犯のために登下校時は、名札を外してください。
lessons.english: In order to prevent crime, please take off your name tag when travelling to and from school.

lessons.japanese: 防犯カメラの映像をよく見たら人がいた。
lessons.english: If you look at the security camera footage closely, there's a person there.

lessons.japanese: 防犯カメラの映像をよく見たら人がいた。
lessons.english: If you look at the security camera footage closely, there's a person there.

lessons.japanese: 防犯のために登下校時は、名札を外してください。
lessons.english: For security reasons, please take off your name tag when commuting to and from school.
